data.title: When did Solange get married, why has she split from her husband and what are the affair rumours?
data.meta_description: SOLANGE Knowles has fiercely denied claims she had an affair with her manager John Bogaard, following her separation from husband Alan Ferguson. Here is what you need to know…
data.text:
SOLANGE Knowles has fiercely denied allegations that she had an affair with her manager John Bogaard, following her separation from husband Alan Ferguson.

Beyonce’s sister branded the rumours “unkind” after acknolwedging the breakdown of her marriage. Here's what you need to know…

When did Solange Knowles marry Alan Ferguson?

The 33-year-old singer tied the knot with video director Alan Ferguson in New Orleans on November 16, 2014.

All guests wore white for the special occasion which took place at the Marigny Opera House in Louisiana.

Attendees included Beyonce her rapper husband Jay Z and their daughter Blue Ivy, as well as pop star Janelle Monae.

During the reception, which was held at New Orleans Museum of Art, musicians including Kelela, Questlove, Yameen Allworld and Kindness performed.

Why did Solange Knowles and Alan Ferguson split?

On November 1, 2019 the mother-of-one announced she had parted ways with Alan via Instagram.

In a length post, she wrote: "11 years ago I met a phenomenal man who changed every existence of my life.

“Early this year we separated and parted ways, (and tho it ain't nan no body business) I find it necessary to protect the sacredness of my personal truth and to live in it fully just as I have before and will continue to do.”(sic)

She added: “It is unfair to not have power of your own story as you shape and mold and rewrite it yourself.”

Solange concluded with: "But I’m leaning into the fear of the unknown and all the glory and power I know exist within God and the universes grace."

What are the rumours about Solange Knowles and John Bogaard?

Reports have been circulating claiming Solange had an affair with her manager of five years, John Bogaard.

But she hit back at the claims on Monday, November 4, 2019 and insisted John was not to blame for their marriage collapsing.

Tagging a photo of them walking on a street, she wrote over the image on Instagram: "Yo ty @onvacation for bein the best co-manager for 5 yrs.

“Sorry the internetsss are so unkind n b lying. go back to enjoying ya vacation.”(sic)
